name: Muted.
description:
SYNOPSIS

One night, everything was plunged into darkness. And when words were spoken... he couldn't hear them... but he knew what they were saying.

What happened? And is there a way to reverse it?

Features---

  • Voiced dialogue
  • 4 possible endings
  • An intriguing storyline(?)
  • Unlockable notes

Created on Ren'Py 6.99.11 (Legacy Theme)

*NOTE: Credits roll only on the true ending.

LIST OF ASSETS USED---

Music: Alcaknight, Kevin MacLeod, Amacha

SFX: freesound.org (list of users in the in-game credits)

Images: Cube, Uncle Mugen, Pixabay

Font: Roboto by Christian Robertson
